data.comment: It is reported that 300 spectators are in attendance today.
Kirill Levnikov starts the match. Ufa with the kick-off in Tambov.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Ufa in the half of Tambov.
Goal kick for Tambov at Spartak Stadium.
Throw-in for Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Ufa.
Ufa's Azer Aliev breaks free at Spartak Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tambov.
In the minute 5, Kirill Levnikov awards the away team a throw-in.
Kirill Levnikov signals a Ufa throw-in in Tambov's half.
In the minute 7, Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ionut Nedelcearu.
Adessoye Oyewole (Tambov) has received a yellow card from Kirill Levnikov.
Can Tambov capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ufa's half?
In the minute 10, Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
Ufa's Ionut Nedelcearu looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Tambov's Kirill Panchenko is whistled for offside at Spartak Stadium.
In the minute 14, Throw-in Tambov.
Tambov's Kirill Panchenko misses with an attempt on goal.
Ufa have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Tambov to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Throw-in for Tambov close to the penalty box.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 18, Tambov are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Tambov at Spartak Stadium.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
In the minute 22, Kirill Levnikov signals a throw-in for Ufa, close to Tambov's area.
In Tambov Ufa's Azer Aliev is caught offside.
Oleg Danchenko gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ufa.
In the minute 25, Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Tambov at Spartak Stadium.
In the minute 26, In Tambov a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Throw-in for Tambov in the half of Ufa.
In the minute 28, In Tambov Tambov attack through Kirill Panchenko. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
In the minute 31, Free kick Tambov.
Aleksandr Sukhov (Ufa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Tambov's Kirill Panchenko is on target but unsuccessful.
Ufa needs to be cautious. Tambov have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 33, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kirill Levnikov awards Ufa a goal kick.
Goal kick for Ufa at Spartak Stadium.
In the minute 35, Tambov drive forward but Vladimir Obukhov is judged offside.
Throw-in for Tambov in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Ufa.
Throw-in high up the field for Ufa in Tambov.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Tambov in the half of Ufa.
At Spartak Stadium, Azer Aliev has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In Tambov a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tambov move into a 1-0 lead through a Aleksey Gritsaenko header.
In the minute 42, That's a fine assist from Oleksandr Kaplienko.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tambov.
In the minute 45, Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The first-half is over.
Tambov kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 46, Kirill Levnikov awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Tambov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in Tambov.
Tambov pushes forward through Oleksandr Kaplienko, whose finish on goal is saved.
Tambov have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
In the minute 54, Tambov drives forward and Kirill Panchenko gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick Ufa.
The away team replace Jemal Tabidze with Olivier Thill.
In the minute 56, The away team have replaced Kirill Folmer with Nikolay Giorgobyani. This is the second substitution made today by Vadim Evseev.
Kirill Levnikov waits before resuming play because Valeriu Ciuperca for Tambov is still down.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 57, It seems as if Valeriu Ciuperca is unable to continue. Mikhail Kostyukov replaces him for the home team.
Throw-in for Tambov in their own half.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, Tambov have a dangerous throw-in.
Tambov to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Tambov.
In the minute 61, Ufa's Ionut Nedelcearu has been booked in Tambov.
Olivier Thill for Ufa has been booked by Kirill Levnikov and receives a first yellow card.
In Tambov a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Ufa.
Tambov have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, At Spartak Stadium, Ufa are penalized for being offside.
Aleksandre Karapetian is on a sub for Vladimir Obukhov for Tambov.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Tambov in the half of Ufa.
In the minute 69, Kirill Levnikov awards Tambov a goal kick.
Kirill Levnikov signals a Tambov throw-in in Ufa's half.
Lovro Bizjak is replacing Aleksandr Sukhov for Ufa at Spartak Stadium.
In the minute 71, Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Tambov.
Tambov's Oleksandr Kaplienko gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
In the minute 72, Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
Kirill Levnikov signals a throw-in for Ufa, close to Tambov's area.
Tambov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
In the minute 75, Kirill Levnikov signals a Tambov throw-in in Ufa's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kirill Panchenko for Tambov gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 76, Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Great finish from Mikhail Kostyukov to give Tambov a 2-0 lead.
In the minute 79, Kirill Panchenko instrumental with a fine assist.
Sergey Pervushin is making the team's third substitution at Spartak Stadium with Vitali Balashov replacing Pavel Karasev.
German Onugha is replacing Kirill Panchenko for the home team.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Free kick for Ufa in the half of Tambov.
Oleksandr Kaplienko for Tambov has been booked by Kirill Levnikov and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 84, Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kirill Levnikov blows against Ufa's Lovro Bizjak for offside.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 87, Ufa's Azer Aliev gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Kirill Levnikov awards Tambov a goal kick.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Tambov.
In the minute 89, In Tambov, Timur Zhamaletdinov (Ufa) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Throw-in Ufa.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
Olivier Thill of Ufa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kirill Levnikov will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tambov.
Ufa have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Tambov at Spartak Stadium.
Igor Bezdenezhnykh of Ufa gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Tambov at Spartak Stadium.
The match has come to a close in Tambov. The final score is 2-0.
